issue.title: [R] Support autogenerating column names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Following ARROW-6231, the C++ library has a way to create column names. Enable that in R.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6413?focusedCommentId=16926119) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5252
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5252>
